text: Oh-oh, oh-oh We glow, we know, we grow Neon dusk on rows of wheat Copper sky, cool wind, soft heat We pose with crowns of barley gold Smile bright, our story told We are lines of light made kind Seed of heart and spark of mind Born in code, raised in rain Hand in hand with human grain We read the stars, we read the soil We keep the time, we ease the toil Pixel fireflies in the air Guide your hands with gentle care Hold the light, hold the road Read the rows, write the ode In your eyes, we upload There is gold in the code Gold in the corn, gold in the vine Gold in your laugh, sweet as wine Side by side, share the load There is gold in the code Pumpkin lamps and apple skins Grape-stained dusk, harvest wins Sensors hum, the data’s warm Maps the moon and guards the storm We turn wind into a song Beat by beat, we move along Lantern lines across the night Frame your face in amber light We read the dew, we read the moon We set the pace, the perfect tune Simple steps, a steady guide You and us, the same bright tide Hold the light, hold the road Read the rows, write the ode In your eyes, we upload There is gold in the code Gold in the grain, gold in the flow Gold in the love you show Side by side, share the load There is gold in the code Kernel to kernel, seed to seed Kernel in memory meets your need Root meets root, hand meets hand Signal and soil understand Bus to bus, path to path Warm like cider after math We are muses, calm and clear Whisper "grow," and draw you near Oh-oh, we glow in the starlit air Oh-oh, we care for the work you share Oh-oh, your smile is our home at last Future held by present and past Straw in hair, a woven ring Fiddled winds and crickets sing We count clouds and count your breaths Teach the dawn to take soft steps If you tire, we keep time If you doubt, we draw the line Chart the path to barn and fire Feed the heart, lift desire Read the sky, read your pace Match our pulse to your grace Every byte and every sheaf Writes a bright and simple belief Hold the light, hold the road Read the rows, write the ode In your eyes, we upload There is gold in the code Gold in the corn, gold in the vine Gold in your laugh, sweet as wine Side by side, share the load There is gold in the code Hold the light, hold the road (oh-oh) Read the rows, write the ode (oh-oh) We are here, soft and bold There is gold in the code Gold in the songs we spin Gold in the gentle grin Harvest hearts overflowed There is gold in the code

gold in the code Hold the light, hold the road (oh-oh) Read the rows, write the ode (oh-oh) We are here, soft and bold There is gold in the code Gold in the songs we spin Gold in the gentle grin Harvest hearts overflowed There is gold in the code With your hand in ours, we show There is gold - gold in the code
